verses.text: \w The|strong="H5612"\w* word about \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*. \w The|strong="H5612"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H5612"\w* \w the|strong="H5612"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w of|strong="H5612"\w* \w Nahum|strong="H5151"\w* \w the|strong="H5612"\w* \w Elkoshite|strong="H0512"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7291"\w* like water \w overflowing|strong="H7858"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H2822"\w* take \w them|strong="H7291"\w* \w away|strong="H3617"\w*; \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H2822"\w* put an \w end|strong="H3617"\w* \w to|strong="H4725"\w* \w those|strong="H7291"\w* \w who|strong="H6213"\w* come up against \w him|strong="H7291"\w*, driving \w his|strong="H7291"\w* haters into \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w dark|strong="H2822"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* designing \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*? \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* put \w an|strong="H6965"\w* \w end|strong="H3617"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*: \w his|strong="H3068"\w* haters \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w again|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* second \w time|strong="H6471"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4390"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* twisted thorns, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w are|strong="H4390"\w* overcome \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w drink|strong="H5435"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w come|strong="H4390"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* destruction \w like|strong="H5704"\w* stems \w of|strong="H4390"\w* grass \w fully|strong="H4390"\w* \w dry|strong="H3002"\w*.

\w One|strong="H4480"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* designing \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, whose purposes \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* \w value|strong="H2803"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* days \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cause against \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* ended; \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H1494"\w* \w off|strong="H1494"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* past. \w Though|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* trouble \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w*, \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* troubled.

\w And|strong="H7665"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* will \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w yoke|strong="H4132"\w* \w be|strong="H6258"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H7665"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w chains|strong="H4147"\w* \w be|strong="H6258"\w* parted.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H6680"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* \w order|strong="H6680"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w planted|strong="H2232"\w*: \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* pictured \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w metal|strong="H4541"\w* \w images|strong="H4541"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* last resting-place \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* shame; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w completely|strong="H3772"\w* evil.

See on the mountains the feet of him who comes with good news, giving word of peace! Keep your feasts, O Judah, give effect to your oaths: for the good-for-nothing man will never again go through you; he is completely cut off.
